definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The inner ear and the semicircular canal and utricle balance function main balloon.
sentences.chinese: 內耳的半規管以及橢圓囊和球囊主要有平衡功能。

sentences.english: Located within the labyrinth are three semicircular canals that act as angular accelerometers for the head.
sentences.chinese: 在骨迷路上，有3個作爲頭部角加速度計的半規管。

sentences.english: It was enough for the canal to act as an amplifier for every sound in his body.
sentences.chinese: 這已經足夠讓半規管作爲體內每處聲音的放大器了。
